FROM k8s.gcr.io/debian-base:v1.0.0
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    iproute2 \
    iptables \
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
ADD bin/ARG_ARCH/ARG_BIN /ARG_BIN
EXPOSE 53 53/udp
EXPOSE 53 53/tcp
ENTRYPOINT ["/ARG_BIN"]
